## BunJSRouteRegistry class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Регистрация маршрутов для BunJS

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BunJSRouteRegistry 
```

## Example


```typescript
import { BunJSRouteRegistry, BunJSRequestWithParams } from './BunJSRouteRegistry';

const port = 3000;

Bun.serve({
   port,
   fetch(request: Request) {
       return BunJSRouteRegistry.handle(request as BunJSRequestWithParams);
   }
});

console.log(`Server running on http://localhost:${port}`);
```
